p: The MTT assay performed using Vero cells generated IC 50 values of 1120 μg/ml and 16.37 μg/ml for the MeOH:DCM extracts of R. vulgaris and doxorubicin (Fig. 3). The methanol R. vulgaris extracts ( p-value of 0.0039) supported the proliferation of cells and showed no cytotoxic properties in the tested concentrations (Fig. 2). Marginal cytotoxic properties developed as the MeOH:DCM extract ( p-value of 0.1173) concentration increased (Fig. 3).
